title: Corporate Mundo quotes not working
body:
Hello,

I am a Mundo main and I purchased the Corporate Mundo skin a few years ago now. I recently returned to League within the past 4 or 5 months and after a patch or two I have noticed that my Corporate Mundo skin seems to be faulty. The skin itself visually is fine, but he does a mix of his Corporate Mundo quotes and his normal Mundo quotes. In fact, it's mostly his normal Mundo quotes. He says the odd corporate witticism, but I find them rare. This has been ongoing for probably 2 or 3 months now. I tried googling it but could not find anyone with similar issues. Do you know how to fix this? Thanks!

replies.body:
Hi there!

Thanks for the heads up! This is fixed and should be back to normal next patch :)

FYI there are also several Kai'Sa lines not triggering properly (Honeyfruit, kill w/ Void Seeker, Support quotes etc.) so an investigation into that would be nice. She basically uses half of the quotes she's meant to have due to the trigger issues.
Hey could you look into a bug affecting Zoe and Ezreal?  Neither one can play taunt quotes when near allies.  It really ruins the already scarce "You belong is a museum!" spam.
Thanks! I will look for the fix next patch! :)

There is a bug with vayne where she doesnt get an automatic penta when going full ap. Could you fix that too? Worth a shot

Edit: i get why i was downvoted, but u got to admit, it was worth a shot.
